Class RGhost::Barcode::Border
In: rghost_barcode/rghost_barcode_base.rb
Parent: RGhost::Barcode::Parameter

Display border properties. It‘s used on the contructor of the class RGhost::Barcode::Base(parent of all barcodes) by Hash :border. Between parenthesis the original parameter.

  • :show(showborder) - Enabled by true. Example: :show => true
  • :width(borderwidth) - Width of border in points.
  • :left, :right, :top, :bottom( borderleft, borderright, bordertop, borderbottom) - specifies the width of the each side of border.
  • :color(textcolor) - Color of text. Only rgb hex. Example: :color => ‘FF0000‘

Example: 

 doc=Document.new
 doc.barcode_interleaved2of5('0123456789', :border => {:width => 4, :left => 15, :right => 15, :show => true} )
